Package DAO

Class usersDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.usersDAO
public class usersDAO extends Object
The type Users dao. This class contains methods used to interact with the users table in the database.

    • checkLogin

      public static boolean checkLogin(String username, String password)
      Check login boolean. This method checks if the username and password entered by the user match a username and password in the database to verify access for logging in.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the boolean
